org.fhaes.neofhchart

Class SeriesSVG

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fhaes.model.FHSeries
      • org.fhaes.neofhchart.SeriesSVG

  • public class SeriesSVG
extends FHSeries
    SeriesSVG Class. This class extends FHSeries to keep track of series visibility as well as metadata not currently supported by FHSeries.
    Author:
    Aaron Decker, Michael Ababio, Zachariah Ferree, Matthew Willie, Peter Brewer

    • Field Summary
